content.text: I'm a writer, I'm passionate about my work and I love working from home.
That's cool, I'm in art school, I'm trying to make it as a painter.
Thanks! I'm married, but I'm sure you're not looking to settle down anytime soon.
You're right, I'm single and I enjoy my freedom. I'm curious about my family's history, but I don't know much about it.
I'm not sure, I'm not really close with my family.
I'm sorry to hear that. I'm close with my family, but I'm not sure much about our history either.
We can find out together! I'm sure there's some information online.
That's a great idea! I'm down to research our family's history.
Awesome! I'll start looking online and I'll let you know what I find.
